classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
GUI Component for Omnibus-Filetransfer
        --------------------------------------
        
        With Omnibus you can send files to a friend or get files a friend has prepared
        for you to download. It's designed to "just work" in a variety of networking
        contexts like: over the Internet, in a LAN (with or without Internet connection)
        or just over a bluetooth link. Transfers can comfortably be paused and resumed.
        And there is also a chat functionality.
        
        This package contains the GUI component which acts as a frontend for the
        omnibus-backend.
        
        Features implemented in the GUI:
         - File Transfer
         - User Management
         - Chat
info.keywords: omnibus filetransfer,file transfer,chat,decentralized,overlay networks,SpoVNet,Next Generation Internet
info.name: omnibus-driver
info.html_description:
GUI Component for Omnibus-Filetransfer
--------------------------------------

With Omnibus you can send files to a friend or get files a friend has prepared
for you to download. It's designed to "just work" in a variety of networking
contexts like: over the Internet, in a LAN (with or without Internet connection)
or just over a bluetooth link. Transfers can comfortably be paused and resumed.
And there is also a chat functionality.

This package contains the GUI component which acts as a frontend for the
omnibus-backend.

Features implemented in the GUI:
- File Transfer
- User Management
- Chat
